data.title: Last name PUJOL: origin and meaning
data.meta_description: Last Name : PUJOL, Learn more about the geographical origin and the etymology of this last name
data.text:
Origin

Pujol : 1: Catalan: topographic name for someone who lived at a high place from pujol a diminutive of puig ‘hill hillock’ (from Latin podiolum) or a habitational name from any of numerous places in Catalonia (Spain) named with this word.2: French (southern): variant of Poujol a cognate of 1 above.

Pujols : 1: Catalan: habitational name from a place called Els Pujols in Barcelona.2: French (southern): habitational name from a place so named in Gironde. Compare Pujol.

More

Source : DAFN2 : Dictionary of American Family Names 2nd edition, ©2022 by Patrick Hanks and Oxford University Press
